description: Magic, dragons, and new gods will shape the world...or destroy it. The complete series boxed set of the bestselling dragon riding adventure from Amazon All-Star author Jada Fisher. Blessed with a magic she doesn’t understand, Ukrah must find her way in a world that doesn’t embrace her or her gifts. Accompanied by a talking bird and a strange young man who took her in, she must find the legendary dragon rider who saved the world from the Blight. Can Ukrah escape from those who would enslave her, find the only person who can help her realize her destiny, and ultimately bring balance to a world being reshaped by magic? The Rise of the Black Dragon Complete Series Boxed Set contains the entire Rise of the Black Dragon series, which follows the story of a girl with a magic she doesn’t understand and cannot control. Stories Included: Escape New Beginnings Black Dragon Reborn Vessel of the Gods Deception Betrayed Ripped Through Time Circle of Time Download the Rise of the Black Dragon Complete Series Boxed Set and get lost in this epic dragon riding adventure today! Always FREE on Kindle Unlimited Read more
